Articles.Content:
WARNING

I use a language other than English

I am using Google Translate

 

 

Four days ago, my KSP suddenly started slow, start takes 50 minutes, no Mod and DLC
My KSP version is 1.2.2

That is very slow, reinstall and start again.

Remember to backup your saves first.

Did you get the game from Steam? If you did, then you can do a file verification.

You can also look for the KSP.log and output_log.txt files (if you are running Windows), or Player.log file. If they are very big, that will make your game run slow. You can delete those log files (the game will make new small ones).

"Starting KSP takes several minutes or more

This is caused by a bug in the game engine (Unity) that we cannot fix at this time. However, there is a workaround available that involves removing all unused/inactive (virtual) network interfaces such as Hamachi."
